https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zV9lREMWPUyOSLeySjf4RFj9mQx.jpg An adolescent groupie zeroes in on her Blondie-like idol after the singer chances to cross her orbit on a publicity tour. Gradually their lives intertwine as, with near-operatic intensity, the film delves into the emotional dependency on both sides of celebrity culture. Backstage
